Uses of Package
fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc

  • Packages that use fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc 
    Package Description
    fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc
    Dynamic remote component creation and connection for component assemblies.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.dynamic_cs.components
    Components for the dynamic client/server example The dynamic client/server example uses three components: DynamicURIConsumer is the dynamic version of the component URIConsumer of the basic client/server example.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.components
    Le SynchronizerManager et le DistributedSynchronizerManager vont assurer la création de composants de synchronisation, présents dans le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.components.syncTools.
  • Classes in fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc used by fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc 
    Class and Description
    DynamicallyConnectableComponentI
    The interface DynamicallyConnectableI defines a component service to connect some of its port to another component at run-time.
    DynamicComponentCreationI
    The interface DynamicComponentCreationI defines the component creation service offered and required interface.
  • Classes in fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc used by fr.upmc.components.examples.dynamic_cs.components 
    Class and Description
    DynamicallyConnectableComponentInboundPort
    The class DynamicallyConnectableComponentInboundPort reifies the DynamicallyConnectableComponentI offered interface for a component and connects it to the requiring component through a DynamicallyConnectableComponentConnector connector.
    DynamicallyConnectableI
    The interface DynamicallyConnectableI defines the component methods implementing the dynamic connection service.
    DynamicComponentCreationOutboundPort
    The class DynamicComponentCreationOutboundPort implements the outbound port of a DynamicCOmponentCreator client component.
  • Classes in fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc used by fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.components 
    Class and Description
    DynamicComponentCreationOutboundPort
    The class DynamicComponentCreationOutboundPort implements the outbound port of a DynamicCOmponentCreator client component.
